clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in mediastinal lymph nodes with SUVmax 10.59.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in mediastinal lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
